meanings.definition: Make a cut or gash in (something) with a sharp tool or object.
meanings.sent1: She carefully incises the paper with scissors.
meanings.sent2: The chef incises the vegetables for the stir-fry.
meanings.sent3: The artist incises a smiley face into the pumpkin for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor incises the marble, revealing a hidden figure within.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon incises the skin with precision before performing the operation.

meanings.definition: Cut into (something) with a sharp tool or object.
meanings.sent1: He incises the wood to create intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler incises the metal to set the gemstone.
meanings.sent3: The barber incises a pattern into the customer's hair.
meanings.sent4: The engraver incises the message onto the silver plate.
meanings.sent5: The tailor incises the fabric to tailor the perfect fit.
